name: junction
description: Short-URL service built for Cloudflare Workers, Pages, and KV.
author: tycrek <t@tycrek.com> (https://tycrek.com)

scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run pagery && node ./node_modules/wrangler/bin/wrangler.js pages dev dist/ --kv junction
scripts.publish: npm run build && node ./node_modules/wrangler/bin/wrangler.js pages publish dist/ --project-name=junction
